Lead Bookrunners: Goldman Sachs & Co. LLC, Citigroup, Wells Fargo Securities, Barclays
Co-Bookrunners: Guggenheim Securities, Mizuho, Truist Securities, BMO Capital Markets, Deutsche Bank Securities
Syndicate Members: KeyBanc Capital Markets, Cantor, CIBC Capital Markets, Capital One Securities, Wedbush Securities, SMBC Nikko
Directed Share Program: Up to 5% of the shares offered, or 1,150,000 shares
Post-IPO Voting Control: Holders of Class B common stock will represent approximately 99.3% of the total voting power immediately following the offering.

Notes.Shares Offered (Primary): All shares sold by Rubrik, Inc.
Notes.Shares Offered (Secondary): No shares offered by selling stockholders
Notes.Total Shares Outstanding: This is the sum of 163,046,971 Class B shares (Pro Forma after conversions) and 23,500,000 Class A shares offered. (Excludes potential shares from RSU net settlement and Greenshoe)
Notes.Gross Proceeds: Initial public offering price multiplied by 23,500,000 shares
Notes.Net Proceeds: Proceeds to Rubrik, Inc., before expenses
Notes.Greenshoe Option: 15% of the final 23.5 million shares offered
Notes.Directed Share Program: Reserved for sale at the IPO price to certain persons identified by management
Notes.Shares Delivery Date: The shares are delivered against payment (the closing date of the offering)

Co-Bookrunners: Barclays, Deutsche Bank Securities, Evercore ISI, Jefferies
Syndicate Members: Needham & Company, Stifel, Craig-Hallum Capital Group, Roth Capital Partners, Loop Capital Markets, Siebert Williams Shank
Post-IPO Voting Control: Holders of Class B common stock retained significant voting power.

Notes.S1 Filing Date: Date of the final prospectus (424B4 filing date).
Notes.IPO Price Range: The final revised price range before pricing at $36.00.
Notes.Shares Offered (Primary): Shares sold by Astera Labs, Inc. (excluding greenshoe).
Notes.Total Shares Outstanding: Requires calculation from Capitalization table in the prospectus (N/A provided here).
Notes.Gross Proceeds: Based on the total 19,800,000 shares offered multiplied by the $36.00 final price.
Notes.Net Proceeds: Proceeds to Astera Labs from its share sale (Primary shares) after deducting the underwriting discount, before estimated offering expenses.
Notes.Greenshoe Option: Shares Astera Labs granted to the underwriters to purchase.
Notes.Underwriter Discount (Total): Total discount for the 19,800,000 shares in the initial offering.
Notes.Shares Delivery Date: The closing date of the offering.
